channel.title: Half-Life 2 beta-styled maps?
channel.description: Are there any released maps that are influenced by the style of the HL2 beta and are of good mapping quality? I'm not talking mods like MI or Dark Interval, but rather maps that are simply influenced by the artistic style of the beta, or anything remotely similar.

item.title: Half-Life 2 beta-styled maps?
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
yeah i’m tracking that currently, it looks good along with missing info and Dark Interval

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 2 beta-styled maps?
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
Obsidian conflict may have somthing, but i cant guranteee it

i too love hl2 beta’s universe and wish more people could make custom content inspired by that cut universe

item.title: Half-Life 2 beta-styled maps?
item.dc:creator: maxximo
item.description:
U can use the Missing Information 1.6 maps, the’re not so much playable, but the are very “artistic” in the way of concept map.
